languages.text:
Древние и устрашающие орудия, захваченные на корабле почитателей Архиврага и очищенные от скверны семилетним бдением техзорцизма.
Бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} средней дальности с 3 зарядами, наносящими по 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
languages.original_text:
Древние и устрашающие орудия, захваченные на корабле почитателей Архиврага и очищенные от скверны семилетним бдением техзорцизма.
Бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушки{/g} средней дальности с 3 зарядами, наносящими по 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.

languages.text:
这件古老而可怕的武器是从混沌大敌的船上缴获而来的。机械修会的成员进行了长达七年的守望，最终终于净化了这件武器。
这种中程{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}组安装在侧舷，可发射3枚炮弹，每枚炮弹可造成24点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: 这件古老而可怕的武器是从混沌大敌的船上缴获而来的。机械修会的成员进行了长达七年的守望，最终终于净化了这件武器。

languages.text: 渾沌の勢力の信者の船で手に入れた古代の恐ろしい武器で、7年と長きにわたる夜通しの技術払いで清められた。中距離の舷側{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}。3発発射可能で、1発あたり24{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: 仇敵の信奉者の船で捕獲された古代の恐ろしい武器が、7年間の長期にわたる祈りの技術的な悪魔祓いによって清められた。

languages.text: Armas antiguas y temibles, capturadas en la nave de los devotos del Archienemigo y purificadas mediante tecnoexorcismo a lo largo de una vigilia de siete años. {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macrocañones{/g} laterales de medio alcance que disparan 3 veces e infligen 24 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} por disparo.
languages.original_text:
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: Armas antiguas y temibles, capturadas en la nave de los devotos del Archienemigo y purificadas mediante tecnoexorcismo a lo largo de una vigilia de siete años.

languages.text:
D'antiques et effroyables armes capturées sur le vaisseau des adeptes du Grand Ennemi et purifiées par un techxorcisme ayant duré sept longues années.
{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Macro-canons{/g} latéraux à moyenne portée tirant 3 coups et infligeant 24 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par coup.
languages.original_text:
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: D'antiques et effroyables armes capturées sur le vaisseau des adeptes du Grand Ennemi et purifiées par un techsorcisme ayant duré sept longues années.

languages.text: Alte und furchteinflößende Waffen, erobert auf einem Schiff der Anhänger des Erzfeinds und im Verlauf einer siebenjährigen Wache mittels Techsorzismus gereinigt. Mittelstrecken-Breitseiten-{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g}, die 3 Schüsse abfeuern und dabei 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} pro Schuss zufügen.
languages.original_text:
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

traits.locale_text: Alte und furchteinflößende Waffen, erobert auf einem Schiff der Anhänger des Erzfeinds und im Verlauf einer siebenjährigen Wache mittels Techsorzismus gereinigt.
